FuncDef:
The aaa command displays the Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA) view.
By default, the AAA view is not displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After using the aaa command, you can enter the AAA view from the system view. Then, you can carry out security configurations for user access, such as creating a user, setting the user level, configuring an authentication scheme, configuring an authorization scheme, configuring an accounting scheme, and configuring a domain.
